entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
